comments:
Appends a binary code to each vocab term.

Parameters ---------- vocab : dict A dictionary of :class:`gensim.models.word2vec.Vocab` objects.

Notes ----- Expects each term to have an .index attribute that contains the order in which the term was added to the vocabulary.

E.g. term.index == 0 means the term was added to the vocab first.

Sets the .code and .point attributes of each node. Each code is a numpy.array containing 0s and 1s. Each point is an integer.
